Class AddressBookUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • AddressBookUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddressBookInterface<PersonInterface>

    public class AddressBookUtility
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddressBookInterface<PersonInterface>
    This class manages the data for an address book utility through a HashTable of PersonInterface objects
    Author:
    Adam Holt
